title: Getting Started with AI in Web Development
excerpt: Learn how to integrate the power of Generative AI into your modern web applications with this introductory guide.
content:
The Rise of AI in Web Development

Artificial Intelligence is no longer a futuristic concept; it's here, and it's transforming web development. From generating code to creating dynamic user experiences, AI is a powerful tool in any developer's arsenal.

This post will walk you through the basics of using Genkit to add AI-powered features to a Next.js application. We'll cover setting up your environment, creating your first AI flow, and calling it from a React component.

What is Genkit?

Genkit is a powerful framework for building AI-powered applications. It provides a simple and consistent way to interact with various large language models (LLMs) and other AI tools.

title: Mastering Tailwind CSS for Modern UIs
excerpt: A deep dive into the utility-first CSS framework that's taking the web by storm. Learn tips and tricks for building beautiful, responsive interfaces.
content:
Why Tailwind CSS?

Tailwind CSS provides low-level utility classes that let you build completely custom designs without ever leaving your HTML. It's a different approach compared to component-based frameworks like Bootstrap, but it offers unparalleled flexibility and control.

Best Practices

In this article, we explore best practices for organizing your Tailwind projects, creating reusable components with `@apply`, and configuring your `tailwind.config.ts` for maximum efficiency.
